subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Henrik Zetterberg and Tomas Holmstrom scored in the first period, then Chris Osgood finished his first shutout of the season to give the host Detroit Red Wings a 2-0 victory against the Boston Bruins on Tuesday night.
snippet: Henrik Zetterberg and Tomas Holmstrom scored in the first period, then Chris Osgood finished his first shutout of the season to give the host Detroit Red Wings a 2-0 victory against the Boston Bruins on Tuesday night.
